item.title: Setup RVM and Ruby
item.description: I’m putting this here so that I have it saved. I’ve done this many times and until I automate it with a Puppet or Chef script…. Install curl sudo apt-get install curl Install RVM (forgot this, thanks Jasdeep) curl -L get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --auto Reload .bash_profile . ~/.bash_profile Run rvm requirements to see what needs to be installed rvm requirements ... Requirements for ubuntu/12.10/x86_64 NOTE: 'ruby' represents Matz's Ruby Interpreter (MRI) (1.

item.title: Readline Error With RVM and Rails 3 on Ubuntu
item.description: So I’m using Rails 3 with RVM these days.
